oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Fourth Avenue North, downtown Nashville, circa 1960s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A view of Noel Hotel (202 4th Avenue N) and the Third National Bank Building (170 4th Avenue N) at the corners of 4th Avenue N and Church Street. Other commercial businesses pictured are the Exchange Building (311 Church Street) and Tommy’s Pub (313 Church Street). Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 filmstrip negative : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Noel Hotel (Nashville, Tenn.); Third National Bank (Nashville, Tenn.); Exchange Building (Nashville, Tenn.); Tommy’s Pub (Nashville, Tenn.)
